example.code: PS C:\> New-EC2ScheduledInstance -ScheduledInstanceId sci-1234-1234-1234-1234-123456789012 -InstanceCount 1 ` -IamInstanceProfile_Name my-iam-role ` -LaunchSpecification_ImageId ami-12345678 ` -LaunchSpecification_InstanceType c4.large ` -LaunchSpecification_SubnetId subnet-12345678` -LaunchSpecification_SecurityGroupId sg-12345678
example.description: This example launches the specified Scheduled Instance.
